```{sql}
SELECT t.production_year, mi.info AS genre, mi.movie_id, COUNT(mi2.movie_id) AS num_times
FROM movie_info AS mi
INNER JOIN title AS t ON t.id = mi.movie_id
INNER JOIN movie_info AS mi2 ON mi2.movie_id = mi.movie_id
WHERE t.production_year > 2000
AND mi.info_type_id = 3
AND mi.info_type_id = 3
GROUP BY mi.movie_id
;
```
